definition[0]: curved outwards or shaped like a hook
definition[1]: if you are hooked on a drug, you feel a strong need for it and you cannot stop taking it
example[1]: I know a girl who got hooked on cocaine.
definition[2]: if you are hooked on something, you enjoy it very much and you want to do it as often as possible
example[2]: I got hooked on TV when I was sick.
